h2_title: Venom Daoist Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter
content: In his first phase, he'll still use all the same moves you remember, including his most familiar crouching slash that hits twice before he leaps into the air to stab the ground.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Venom_Daoist.md', within the main section titled 'Venom Daoist', specifically from the subsection 'Venom Daoist Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter'.
The content is as follows:
In his first phase, he'll still use all the same moves you remember, including his most familiar crouching slash that hits twice before he leaps into the air to stab the ground.
